Lakewood.Steilacoom Community Church:
Steilacoom Community Church is a Protestant church in Steilacoom, Washington, founded in 1883.


== History ==
The original church was established in 1883 as Oberlin Congregational Church with eight charter members, including its first minister, Arthur Burnell. The vacant Presbyterian Mission was purchased with the help of the American Home Mission board to house the new church.
